title: hello world!
text:
MBA Student
Vancouver, Canada | LinkedIn Profile






I am an MBA candidate at University Canada West with a professional background in education and administration. My experience as a Primary School Teacher and Administrative Assistant has strengthened my ability to lead teams, manage operations, and communicate complex ideas clearly across diverse stakeholders.
Working in both academic and administrative environments has shaped my structured and disciplined approach to problem-solving. I am particularly interested in how data analytics and strategic decision-making improve organizational performance and long-term sustainability. Through my MBA studies—especially in Business Predictive Analytics—I am developing the ability to translate data into actionable business insights.
My goal is to transition into roles where analytical thinking, operational efficiency, and strategic planning drive measurable impact.








Master of Business Administration (MBA) — University Canada West


Vancouver, Canada • Specialization: General MBA


Relevant Coursework: Business Predictive Analytics, Strategic Management, Financial Decision-Making, Operations Management




Bachelor’s Degree in Education — Royal University of Bhutan


Graduated: 2016









Primary School Teacher — Tshaidang Primary School


Zhemgang, Bhutan • 2017–2022



Managed classroom operations for 30+ students while maintaining structured learning outcomes and performance standards.


Designed lesson plans aligned with institutional objectives, improving student engagement and academic performance.


Monitored student progress using structured assessment frameworks and performance metrics.


Coordinated with parents and school leadership to ensure consistent communication and alignment on development goals.


Led extracurricular initiatives that enhanced student participation and community involvement.





Administrative Assistant — Zhemgang District Administration


Zhemgang, Bhutan • 2023–2024



Supported daily administrative operations, including documentation management, scheduling, and internal communications.


Streamlined record-keeping processes, improving document retrieval efficiency and workflow.


Assisted management with data entry, reporting, and performance tracking.


Coordinated meetings, prepared reports, and maintained confidential records with accuracy and professionalism.


Contributed to process improvements that reduced administrative delays and enhanced productivity.







Strategic Thinking
Ability to align daily operations with long-term institutional objectives.
Leadership & Stakeholder Management
Experience leading classrooms, coordinating with parents, and supporting executive-level administrative functions.
Operational Discipline
Strong organizational skills developed through structured classroom management and administrative systems.
Data & Analytical Literacy
Experience interpreting performance data and currently strengthening predictive analytics capabilities through MBA coursework.
Communication
Clear, structured communication across diverse audiences, from students to senior management.



Contributed to MBA team-based analytical projects involving data cleaning, exploratory data analysis, and business reporting.
Applied structured problem-solving frameworks to case studies in operations and strategy.
Demonstrated leadership through collaborative academic projects and presentation delivery.



Email: ringotash1992@gmail.com
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/tashi-tshering-tamang-8b6a52344/
